game.name: Train Simulator: Burlington Northern U25
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The locomotive that helped change the face and history of North American railroading – the remarkable General Electric U25B “U-Boat” (along with its six-axle sister, the U25C) – is now available for Train Simulator Classic!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The locomotive that helped change the face and history of North American railroading – the remarkable General Electric U25B “U-Boat” (along with its six-axle sister, the U25C) – is now available for Train Simulator Classic!
